text:
Is there a way to extend the amount of dummy blog posts when working on a blog listing template using the beta edit feature?

The contents variable contains dummy data for 5 blog posts. The contents.total_count and contents.total_page_count variables are undefined. And changing the number of blog posts in settings > blog > templates doesn’t affect the dummy data at all.
I would really like this feature, I usually have to create x random posts and set posts per page to 1 to test the pagination

Hi everyone! I’m having a bizarre issue with changing the template on a page. When I’m creating a new website page I’m able to select the template from a recently uploaded new theme, but when it comes to updating a template on an already existing page, even though I see my theme, there’s no template to select. Have you ever met an issue like that?

For the record, this is at the top of my template:
```<!--
  templateType: page
  isAvailableForNewContent: true
  screenshotPath: ../images/templates/homepage.jpg
  label: Homepage
-->```
